bibl.title: A New Fragment for a Zenon Papyrus from Athens.
bibl.note: P. Athen. Zenon 2 (= S.B. V, 8243) + P. Mich. Inv. 3098. Letter to Apollonios (258-256): a proposal to undertake embankment works on an enormous scale (15.000 men work for 60 days).

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Athen. Zenon 2 + P. Mich. Inv. 3098
Clarysse Willy, A New Fragment for a Zenon Papyrus from Athens.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 77-81.
P. Athen. Zenon 2 (= S.B. V, 8243) + P. Mich. Inv. 3098. Letter to Apollonios (258-256): a proposal to undertake embankment works on an enormous scale (15.000 men work for 60 days).
